name: Battle Royal Game
description:
** Prototype **

At this point, we have all the characters but can't fight each other for now :)

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Controls:

Character 1 (Goblin): WASD to move, C to jump, and V to Shoot.

Character 2 (Orange): Arrows to move, < to shoot, and > to Jump

Character 3 (Monster Fish): YGHJ to move, B to Shoot, and N to Jump

_____________________________________________________________________________________________
